mapper.select: select c.cart_id, c.member_id, c.pr_number, c.amount, c.status, pf.fileName, p.pr_name, p.pr_seller, p.pr_price, p.pr_discount, pr_dPrice from cart c inner join pr_files pf on (c.pr_number=pf.pr_number) inner join pr p on (c.pr_number=p.pr_number) where member_id= #{id}
select fileName from cart c left outer join pr_files pf on c.pr_number = pf.pr_number where c.pr_number = #{pr_number} and filenum = (select min(filenum) from pr_files where pr_number = #{pr_number})
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cart_id = #{cart_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: update cart set amount = amount + 1 where cart_id = ${cart_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
update cart set amount = amount - 1 where cart_id = ${cart_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select count(cart_id) from cart where member_id = #{id} and status = 1
select ifnull(sum(p.pr_dPrice * c.amount),0) from cart c inner join pr p on c.pr_number = p.pr_number where c.member_id = #{id} and status = 1
select ifnull(sum((p.pr_price - p.pr_dPrice) * c.amount),0) from cart c inner join pr p on c.pr_number = p.pr_number where c.member_id = #{id} and status = 1
